scripts.ci: ./node_modules/.bin/ganache-cli --gasLimit 8000000 -q & echo 'local chain started.' && ./node_modules/.bin/truffle compile && node scripts/test/ci.js && ./node_modules/.bin/solhint 'contracts/**/*.sol'

scripts.stop: kill -9 "$(ps -ax | grep -m1 '[n]ode ./node_modules/.bin/ganache-cli' | awk '{print $1;}')" && echo 'local chain stopped.'
